sentences.english: Thank God for the invention of the VCR.
sentences.chinese: 感謝上帝VCR被髮明出來了。

sentences.english: Autophagy is needful to autophagic apoptosis of L02cells induced by VCR.
sentences.chinese: 自噬是VCR誘導的L02細胞自噬性凋亡所需要的。

sentences.english: The stability of drilling chamber is an important facet to ensure the safe operation of VCR mining method.
sentences.chinese: 鑿巖峒室的穩定性是VCR採礦法安全的重要保障。

sentences.english: When play a VCR tape during a conference, do not use the mute button.
sentences.chinese: 在會議期間播放VCR盒帶，不要用消音鍵。
